titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/6/1988--Introduced. Elects the following Representatives to the specified House committee: (1) Jerry F. Costello, to the Committee on Public Works and Transportation; (2) Stephen J. Solarz, to the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries; and (3) Lewis F. Payne, Jr., to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
